comments.body: You're referencing other user, why is this?
Alex actually helped me develop this as a typescript project in a hackthon previously which I am finishing up as part of thie PR, so I wanted to give him credit. We work together here at mParticle.

that's OK, but probably he should be part of PR review, to ACK using Github's handle here.
That's not enforced on DT, but good netiq IMO
That makes sense.  Adding him now, as we went through an internal approval process before I posted this PR for Definitely Typed.
